title.rendered: BOSS AIR MASTER PLUS ONBOARD AIR

content.rendered:
BOSS AIR MASTER PLUS ONBOARD AIR

Boss Air Master Plus Onboard Air available for order now through Automax 4×4! Order online, come in & see us or give us a call on (02) 6699 2744 for a quote!

The “Ducks Nuts” in onboard air kits, this kit will give you everything, good volume of air supply for air tools, inflation of 4×4 tyres for you and your mates as well as controlling your Boss Load Assist kit from inside your cab and supply regulated air to your Air Lockers protecting the seals.

Includes;

  • 1 x PX-07 3/4 hp 12 volt BOSS Air Compressor
  • 1 x AT-03 3 Gallon/ 9ltr 5 port Boss Aluminium Air Tank
  • 1 x 110-150psi Pressure Switch
  • 1 x 700mm Teflon Coated Stainless Steel Braided Hose
  • 1 x 100% Duty Solenoid
  • 1 x Check Valve
  • 1 x Flare Fitting
  • 1 x Drain Tap
  • 1 x 3/8” 12v Electric Solenoid/ Valve
  • 1 x 12volt momentary switch for compressor
  • 1 x BOSS 200psi Dual Needle back-lit Gauge
  • 2 x Pneumatic Push Buttons for dropping each bag
  • 1 x Stamped stainless steel gauge panel
  • 4 x 1/4” female push fittings for gauge and buttons
  • 15 meters of 1/4” J844 DOT Airbrake line
  • 2 x 3/8 check valves
  • 5 x 1/4” push connect fittings
  • 3 x Y Connectors,
  • 2 x T Connectors
  • 3/8” x 3/8”NPT push fitting for connecting your air line
  • 1/4” x 3/8”NPT fitting to connect airbrake line to air locker
  • 15 x Cable Ties
  • 1 x Mini Regulator with Gauge for Air Locker Feed
  • 1 x 1/4” x 3/8”NPT fitting
  • 1 x 1/4” x 1/4” hex nipple
  • Instruction Sheet

Extra Options Available;

  • Remote Nitto Add-on
    • Add a remote Nitto Coupling so you can “plug-in” to pump up tyres or use air tools
To view the range of Boss Air products available, CLICK HERE!
Follow us on Instagram and Facebook to keep up to date with what’s going on in our workshop!
